00046 // internal macro, usage: EVCB.beginSend(...)
00047 #define EVCB  ev.suppress_notifications ? (void)0 : ev

00067 #define ev  (*cSimulation::getActiveEnvir())

00084 #define EV  ev.isDisabled()?ev:ev   /*Note: deliberately NO parens*/

00101 class SIM_API cEnvir
00102 {
00103     friend class evbuf;
00104   public:
00105     // Internal flag for express mode.
00106     bool disable_tracing;
00107 
00108     // Internal flag. When set to true, the simulation kernel MAY omit calling
00109     // the following cEnvir methods: messageScheduled(), messageCancelled(),
00110     // beginSend(), messageSendDirect(), messageSendHop(), messageSendHop(),
00111     // messageSendHop(), messageDeleted(), moduleReparented(), simulationEvent(),
00112     // componentMethodBegin(), moduleCreated(), moduleDeleted(), connectionCreated(),
00113     // connectionDeleted(), displayStringChanged().
00114     bool suppress_notifications;
00115 
00116     // Internal flag. When set, cRuntimeError constructor to raises an exception.
00117     bool debug_on_errors;
00118 
00119   protected:
00120     // further internal vars
00121     std::ostream out;
00122 
00123   protected:
00124     // internal: ev.printf() and ev<< eventually ends up here; write the first n characters of string s
00125     virtual void sputn(const char *s, int n) = 0;
00126 
00127     // internal: pop up a dialog with the given message; called from printfmsg()
00128     virtual void putsmsg(const char *msg) = 0;
00129 
00130     // internal: ask a yes/no question, throws exception if cancelled; askYesNo() delegates here
00131     virtual bool askyesno(const char *msg) = 0;
00132 
00133     // internal: flushes the internal stream buffer by terminating last line if needed
00134     void flushLastLine();
00135 
00136   public:
00139 
00143     cEnvir();
00144 
00148     virtual ~cEnvir();
00150 
00153 
00160     // note: this cannot be pure virtual, because it has to work even after ev was disposed of
00161     virtual void objectDeleted(cObject *object) {};
00162 
00170     virtual void simulationEvent(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00171 
00185     virtual void messageSent_OBSOLETE(cMessage *msg, cGate *directToGate=NULL) = 0;
00186 
00191     virtual void messageScheduled(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00192 
00197     virtual void messageCancelled(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00198 
00206     virtual void beginSend(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00207 
00209     virtual void messageSendDirect(cMessage *msg, cGate *toGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay) = 0;
00210 
00212     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate) = 0;
00213 
00215     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay) = 0;
00216 
00218     virtual void endSend(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00219 
00225     virtual void messageDeleted(cMessage *msg) = 0;
00226 
00230     virtual void moduleReparented(cModule *module, cModule *oldparent) = 0;
00231 
00238     virtual void componentMethodBegin(cComponent *from, cComponent *to, const char *methodFmt, va_list va) = 0;
00239 
00244     virtual void componentMethodEnd() = 0;
00245 
00251     virtual void moduleCreated(cModule *newmodule) = 0;
00252 
00264     virtual void moduleDeleted(cModule *module) = 0;
00265 
00269     virtual void gateCreated(cGate *newgate) = 0;
00270 
00275     virtual void gateDeleted(cGate *gate) = 0;
00276 
00281     virtual void connectionCreated(cGate *srcgate) = 0;
00282 
00287     virtual void connectionDeleted(cGate *srcgate) = 0;
00288 
00293     virtual void displayStringChanged(cComponent *component) = 0;
00294 
00299     // Note: this may not be pure virtual, as it may get called even after main()
00300     // exited and StaticEnv was destructed, and we don't want to get a "pure virtual
00301     // method called" error
00302     virtual void undisposedObject(cObject *obj) {}
00304 
00307 
00312     virtual void readParameter(cPar *parameter) = 0;
00313 
00323     virtual bool isModuleLocal(cModule *parentmod, const char *modname, int index) = 0;
00324 
00346     virtual cXMLElement *getXMLDocument(const char *filename, const char *path=NULL) = 0;
00347 
00352     virtual unsigned getExtraStackForEnvir() const = 0;
00353 
00361     virtual cConfiguration *getConfig() = 0;
00362 
00368     virtual cConfigurationEx *getConfigEx();
00370 
00378     virtual bool isGUI() const = 0;
00379 
00395     bool isDisabled() const {return disable_tracing;}
00396 
00401     // implementation note: needed because otherwise the templated version
00402     // would cause ambiguity errors in some cases
00403     cEnvir& operator<<(const std::string& t) {out << t; return *this;}
00404 
00416     template<typename T> cEnvir& operator<<(const T& t) {out << t; return *this;}
00417 
00421     cEnvir& operator<<(std::ostream& (t)(std::ostream&)) {out << t; return *this;}
00422 
00427     std::ostream& getOStream() {return out;}
00428 
00433     virtual void bubble(cComponent *component, const char *text) = 0;
00434 
00439     virtual void printfmsg(const char *fmt,...);
00440 
00451     // note: non-virtual, delegates to sputn()
00452     virtual int printf(const char *fmt,...);
00453 
00460     virtual cEnvir& flush() = 0;
00461 
00465     virtual std::string gets(const char *prompt, const char *defaultreply=NULL) = 0;
00466 
00472     // note: non-virtual, delegates to askyesno()
00473     virtual bool askYesNo(const char *fmt,...);
00475 
00478 
00483     virtual int getNumRNGs() const = 0;
00484 
00488     virtual cRNG *getRNG(int k) = 0;
00489 
00494     virtual void getRNGMappingFor(cComponent *component) = 0;
00496 
00506 
00514     virtual void *registerOutputVector(const char *modulename, const char *vectorname) = 0;
00515 
00519     virtual void deregisterOutputVector(void *vechandle) = 0;
00520 
00524     virtual void setVectorAttribute(void *vechandle, const char *name, const char *value) = 0;
00525 
00531     virtual bool recordInOutputVector(void *vechandle, simtime_t t, double value) = 0;
00533 
00543 
00547     virtual void recordScalar(cComponent *component, const char *name, double value, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL) = 0;
00548 
00552     virtual void recordStatistic(cComponent *component, const char *name, cStatistic *statistic, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL) = 0;
00554 
00562 
00566     virtual std::ostream *getStreamForSnapshot() = 0;
00567 
00571     virtual void releaseStreamForSnapshot(std::ostream *os) = 0;
00573 
00579     virtual int getArgCount() const = 0;
00580 
00584     virtual char **getArgVector() const = 0;
00585 
00589     virtual int getParsimProcId() const = 0;
00590 
00595     virtual int getParsimNumPartitions() const = 0;
00596 
00600     virtual unsigned long getUniqueNumber() = 0;
00601 
00615     virtual bool idle() = 0;
00617 };

00627 class SIM_API cRunnableEnvir : public cEnvir
00628 {
00629   public:
00634     virtual int run(int argc, char *argv[], cConfiguration *cfg) = 0;
